data.title: Glory, Honour and Patriotism: Military Careers in the Duchy of Warsaw, 1806–1815
data.meta_description: The image of an invincible Prussian army, which had so impressed itself on the Poles since the reign of Frederick the Great, was destroyed in a single day, on 14 October 1806. The retreat of the demoralized Prussians after the battles of Jena and Auerstädt...
